I ALSO WRITE FIC AND TAKE REQUESTS!! 😁Hope you enjoy my little blog :) AO3: galactic_magic Search "#get to know me questions" to ask me stuff! Masterlist | Fic Request Guidelines

summary: A PSA FOR THOSE WHO HAVE ALREADY STOPPED TAGGING ENDGAME SPOILERS
body:
A PSA FOR THOSE WHO HAVE ALREADY STOPPED TAGGING ENDGAME SPOILERS

I know how hard it is to stay quiet about such a milestone movie like this, but I personally think it is too early to stop tagging spoilers. Please hear me out on this.

I have many people in my life who have anxiety, including myself. Everyone has different triggers that can set off anxiety attacks and panic attacks.

MOVIE THEATERS CAN BE A TRIGGER FOR PEOPLE.

I REPEAT.

MOVIE THEATERS CAN CAUSE PEOPLE ANXIETY AND PANIC ATTACKS.

Thankfully I’m not someone that has that trigger, so I went to see Endgame opening weekend, but I have multiple friends who literally cannot step into a theater without feeling anxious. They’ve described it to me as unsettling, The dark environment, strangers sitting behind you and in front of you, not knowing if you can get out safely in case of an emergency, etc.

These people are diehard Marvel fans just like the rest of us, they just have to wait until the movie comes out on DVD/BluRay/streaming services etc. to watch it.

I can’t stand when people say “oh well if you haven’t seen it by now then you must not be a real fan” like ???? No ????

And no, these people can’t just “get over” their fear of theaters. I invited one of my friends with the fear to go see Guardians 2 with me a couple years ago and when we got there she went straight to the bathroom and had a full on anxiety attack, she was throwing up and shaking and she felt like she was having a heart attack. Thankfully she had some medication with her so she could get through it. I stayed with her until she felt ok and we eventually got into the movie a little bit late, she made it through but barely, she was shaking and fidgeting the whole time and we sat in the back so she could get up and leave easily if she had to.

Basically, what I’m saying is we all need to be respectful of others. Don’t assume that the reason someone hasn’t seen it yet is because they don’t want to. Maybe they literally CAN’T.

Please spread this!!

body:
Spoilers: Avengers Endgame

How come you guys will not recognize that Thanos had to switch one of the stones to his other hand to knock Captain Marvel off by surprise. She was going to beat that ass. Recognize a one-army bitch when you see them.

Also I feel like the writers have no idea what to do with Captain Marvel therefore she comes off this asshole way. I mean they said they finish endgame before they even film Captain Marvel, they rushed her story.

summary: So many people confused about how Carol ended up saving Tony but the mid credits scene from Captain Marvel was publicly released...
body: So many people confused about how Carol ended up saving Tony but the mid credits scene from Captain Marvel was publicly released before Endgame came out for a reason. She showed up on Earth after the snap, asked the Avengers about Fury and they told her what was going on and that they needed to find Tony, so she went to get him. Rocket also probably told Carol to look for the Benatar (he most likely knew how to track it) because he didn’t know about what happened to the rest of the Guardians. Luckily the two were in the same place.

blog.name: marvelzombiespromos
blog.title: Marvel Zombies Promos
blog.description:
This is the promo page for Marvel Zombies RP. For more information, please visit our main page.

The characters advertised are not an exclusive list, rather they are a short list of suggestions. Our intention is to maintain a rotor of characters from a variety of backgrounds. Please feel free to apply outside of the characters posted here.

summary: Marvel Zombies RP Wanted Connection: Carol Danvers Requested by: Jessica Drew Telephone networks have failed, the internet is...
caption:
Marvel Zombies RP Wanted Connection: Carol Danvers
Requested by: Jessica Drew

Telephone networks have failed, the internet is gone. Modern communication seems to have come to an end. What remains is radiowaves. People with the right equipment have begun to communicate with anyone in range using CB radios, walkie talkies, whatever they can get their hands on. Some are broadcasting, some are just listening.

Carol slowly tuned through the channels on the old radio, she had crash landed on her reentry into the Earth’s atmosphere, and when she made it to Manhattan, the Tower was a wreckage. She heard the crackling sound of numbers coming through as she found an active channel –

This is Jessica Drew broadcasting for Carol Danvers. On the off chance you’re not in space and you’re out there, there’s somewhere safe. Haven. I’m here with Gerry. Clint is here. And Peter. Nat, Bobbi, Tony… I’ve saved you a room so you better get your ass here before someone steals it. Hope to see you soon! Love you, Kirk. Co-ordinates to follow…

Marvel Zombies RP is a Marvel Comics AU roleplay established 1 April 2017. We look forward to surviving with you.

Home || Plot || Rules || Taken/Open Characters || FAQ || Most Wanted

blog.name: susiemyersonislifegoals
blog.title: Too Old For Tumblr
blog.description: I didn't Tumblr until I fell into a rabid fandom at age 37. And then another. And another. Now over 40 and pretty much can't get through an hour without seeing a GIF set. Not gonna change my URL but there's not much Maisel compared to my other ships these days. Currently more Supercorp and OUAT than anything else; Bechloe & Root x Shaw forever.

summary: The end of endgame doesn't make fucking sense...
body:
The end of endgame doesn’t make fucking sense…

2. Characters that we were attached to were replaced by a very whiny spiderman kid and bunch of other that I never really cared that were gone (except for the guardians).

3. Endgame doesn’t follow its own rules…

4. They made Captain America more badass just for him to leave in such way that is so not Captain America. Selfish much?

5. Captain Marvel has a stuckup bitch face for the entire movie and she is too op that not even the movie wants her in it lol

Conclusion: Most of the movie was borring, but it was worth watching Thanos punching the stuckup bitch lol

blog.description: Batman, Say it fast. Really fast. As fast as you can. Over and over. So what do you hear? Badman. Bad. Man. Batman. Badman. To me... Now and forever... one and                                             the same. - Peter J. Tomasi                                                                         all spoiler posts are tagged "wednesday spoilers"                                             add me on snapchapt! taskrnaster (with an RN instead of M)

summary: As a woman and a strong believer of equal rights, can I just say that this scene was a bit too force. I mean, Wanda was the one...
body:
As a woman and a strong believer of equal rights, can I just say that this scene was a bit too force. I mean, Wanda was the one who made Thanos cry in pain and Carol stopped Thanos from snapping his fingers while he was wearing all the gems and Shuri is the most intelligent character in the MCU. There was no reason for this girl!power scene, everyone knows that these women are strong and powerful and smart they don’t need a few seconds of “glory”.

(sorry for the English, it’s not my first language)

trail.content_raw:
As a woman and a strong believer of equal rights, can I just say that this scene was a bit too force. I mean, Wanda was the one who made Thanos cry in pain and Carol stopped Thanos from snapping his fingers while he was wearing all the gems and Shuri is the most intelligent character in the MCU. There was no reason for this girl!power scene, everyone knows that these women are strong and powerful and smart they don’t need a few seconds of “glory”.

(sorry for the English, it’s not my first language)
trail.content:
As a woman and a strong believer of equal rights, can I just say that this scene was a bit too force. I mean, Wanda was the one who made Thanos cry in pain and Carol stopped Thanos from snapping his fingers while he was wearing all the gems and Shuri is the most intelligent character in the MCU. There was no reason for this girl!power scene, everyone knows that these women are strong and powerful and smart they don’t need a few seconds of “glory”.

(sorry for the English, it’s not my first language)

body:
“Okay Captain Marvel, we need you to track down a fugitive, she’s been missing since the battle with Thanos, and we need you to NOT fall in love with her.

Carol, five seconds later about to spark the human/alien love story of a generation:
